name: "Premium" Partner
description:
"Premium" Partner

Pefect Partner is a dating game, but not the usual one. The goal is to get rid of the girls because they're kinda ugly and have other bad characteristics and traits.

Controls

Pause - Escape or P

Everything else - Mouse

Featuring

*If you have problems with cropping, try the full screen button in the bottom right of the game, its kinda transparent
